docComment:
/**
 * Provides a {@link @veramo/mediation-manager#MediationManager | plugin} for the {@link @veramo/core#Agent} that implements the {@link @veramo/mediation-manager#IMediationManager} interface.
 *
 * @packageDocumentation
 */
name: @veramo/mediation-manager

members.docComment:
/**
 * The input to the {@link IMediationManager.mediationManagerGetMediation} method.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: IMediationGetArgs

members.docComment:
/**
 * MediationManager plugin interface for {@link @veramo/core#Agent}
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: IMediationManager

members.docComment:
/**
 * Returns a boolean indicating whether the agent is configured to "ALLOW" or "DENY" all mediation requests as the default policy.
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to a boolean
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: isMediateDefaultGrantAll

members.docComment:
/**
 * Takes a {@link RecipientDid} and its owning {@link RequesterDid} and adds it to the store.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * the {@link RecipientDid} is used as the key and the {@link RequesterDid} is the value.
 *
 * @param args - an object {@link IMediationManagerAddRecipientDidArgs}
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to a {@link RequesterDid}. This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerAddRecipientDid

members.docComment:
/**
 * Returns a record of all {@link RequesterDid} and their associated {@link MediationResponse}.
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to a list of {@link RequesterDid} saved to the store. This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerGetAllMediations

members.docComment:
/**
 * Takes a Requester Did and returns the {@link MediationResponse} associated with it from the store.
 *
 * @param args - an object {@link IMediationGetArgs}
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to the {@link MediationResponse} associated with the Requester Did or null if no {@link MediationResponse} exists This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerGetMediation

members.docComment:
/**
 * Takes a Requester Did and returns the {@link PreMediationRequestPolicy} associated with it from the store.
 *
 * @param args - an object {@link IMediationManagerRemoveMediationPolicyArgs}
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to the {@link PreMediationRequestPolicy} associated with the Requester Did or null if no policy exists This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerGetMediationPolicy

members.docComment:
/**
 * Takes a {@link RecipientDid} and returns its associated value {@link RequesterDid}.
 *
 * @param args - an object {@link IMediationManagerRecipientDidArgs}
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves string which is the {@link RequesterDid} This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerGetRecipientDid

members.docComment:
/**
 * Takes a {@link RecipientDid} and returns a boolean indicating whether it has been granted mediation.
 *
 * @param args - an object {@link IMediationManagerRecipientDidArgs}
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to a boolean indicating whether mediation has been granted. This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerIsMediationGranted

members.docComment:
/**
 * Returns an object of keys and their associated {@link PreMediationRequestPolicy} it from the store.
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to an object {@link PreMediationRequestPolicy}. This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerListMediationPolicies

members.docComment:
/**
 * Takes a {@link RequesterDid} and returns all associated {@link RecipientDid}.
 *
 * @param args - an object {@link IMediationManagerListRecipientDidsArgs}
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to an array of {@link RecipientDid} This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerListRecipientDids

members.docComment:
/**
 * Takes a Requester Did and removes the {@link MediationResponse} associated with it from the store.
 *
 * @param args - an object {@link IMediationGetArgs}
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to a boolean indicating success or failure. or null if no {@link MediationResponse} exists This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerRemoveMediation

members.docComment:
/**
 * Takes a Requester Did and removes the {@link PreMediationRequestPolicy} associated with it from the store.
 *
 * @param args - an object {@link IMediationManagerRemoveMediationPolicyArgs}
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to a boolean indicating whether the policy was successfully removed This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerRemoveMediationPolicy

members.docComment:
/**
 * Takes a {@link RecipientDid} and removes it from the store.
 *
 * @param args - an object {@link IMediationManagerRecipientDidArgs}
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to a boolean indicating success or failure. This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerRemoveRecipientDid

members.docComment:
/**
 * Takes a Requester Did and saves the {@link MediationResponse} associated with it to the store.
 *
 * @param args - an object {@link IMediationManagerSaveMediationArgs}
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to a {@link RequesterDid} saved to the store. This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerSaveMediation

members.docComment:
/**
 * Takes a Requester Did and a {@link PreMediationRequestPolicy} and saves it to the store.
 *
 * @param args - an object {@link IMediationManagerSaveMediationPolicyArgs}
 *
 * @returns - a Promise that resolves to the saved Requester Did This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: mediationManagerSaveMediationPolicy

members.docComment:
/**
 * The input to the {@link IMediationManager.mediationManagerAddRecipientDid} method.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: IMediationManagerAddRecipientDidArgs

members.docComment:
/**
 * The input to the {@link IMediationManager.mediationManagerGetMediationPolicy} method.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: IMediationManagerGetMediationPolicyArgs

/**
 * The input to the {@link IMediationManager.mediationManagerListRecipientDids} method.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: IMediationManagerListRecipientDidsArgs

members.docComment:
/**
 * The input to the {@link IMediationManager.mediationManagerGetRecipientDid} method.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: IMediationManagerRecipientDidArgs

members.docComment:
/**
 * The input to the {@link IMediationManager.mediationManagerRemoveMediationPolicy} method.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: IMediationManagerRemoveMediationPolicyArgs

members.docComment:
/**
 * The input to the {@link IMediationManager.mediationManagerSaveMediation} method.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: IMediationManagerSaveMediationArgs

members.docComment:
/**
 * The input to the {@link IMediationManager.mediationManagerSaveMediationPolicy} method.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: IMediationManagerSaveMediationPolicyArgs

members.docComment:
/**
 * Mediation Manager Plugin for {@link @veramo/core#Agent}
 *
 * This plugin exposes methods pertaining to the {@link @veramo/core-types#IMediationManager} interface.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * be advised that the {@link @veramo/mediation-manager#IMediationManager} interface is for use with {@link @veramo/did-comm#DIDComm | DIDCOmm} and specifically the V3 Coordinate Mediation Protocol implementation.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: MediationManagerPlugin

members.docComment:
/**
 * Can be "GRANTED" or "DENIED" and is used to record whether a mediation response for a specific {@link RequesterDid} has been granted or denied.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: MediationResponse

members.docComment:
/**
 * An object of keys and their associated {@link PreMediationRequestPolicy}
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: Mediations

members.docComment:
/**
 * Can be "ALLOW" or "DENY" and is used to determine whether a mediation request for a specific {@link RequesterDid} should be ALLOW or DENY.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: PreMediationRequestPolicy

members.docComment:
/**
 * A string representing the Recipient Did
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: RecipientDid

members.docComment:
/**
 * A string representing the Requester Did
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: RequesterDid
